data.text: Nhyira nka wɔn a wɔn akwan yɛ pɛ,
Nhyira nka wɔn a wɔkora nʼahyɛde,
Wɔnyɛ mfomso biara;
Woayɛ nkyerɛkyerɛ pa ato hɔ
Ao, sɛ anka mʼakwan besi pi,
Sɛ midwen wo mmaransɛm no nyinaa ho a,
Mede koma a mu tew bɛkamfo wo
Medi wo hyɛ nsɛm so;
Aberante bɛyɛ dɛn na nʼakwan ho atew?
Mede me koma nyinaa hwehwɛ wo;
Mede wʼasɛm asie me koma mu
Awurade, ayeyi nka wo;
Mede mʼano ka mmara
Mʼani gye sɛ midi wʼahyɛde so,
Midwinnwen wo nkyerɛkyerɛ ho
Mʼani gye wo hyɛ nsɛm ho;
Yɛ wo somfo yiye;
Bue mʼani na minhu anwonwade a
Meyɛ ɔnanani wɔ asase so;
Me kra tɔ beraw bere biara,
Woka ahantanfo anim, wɔn a wɔadome wɔn,
Yi wɔn animka ne animtiaabu fi me mu,
Ɛwɔ mu sɛ sodifo hyia di me ho nseku,
Wʼahyɛde yɛ mʼanigyede
Woabrɛ me ase ma meda mfutuma mu;
Mesesee mʼakwan na wugyee me so;
Ma mente nea ɛwɔ wo nkyerɛkyerɛ mu ase;
Awerɛhow ama me kra atɔ beraw;
Yi me fi nnaadaa akwan so;
Mafa nokware kwan no so;
Awurade, mikura wo nkyerɛkyerɛ mu dennen,
Mitu mmirika wɔ wo mmaransɛm kwan no so,
Kyerɛkyerɛ me, Awurade, na minni wo hyɛ nsɛm so,
Ma me ntease, na medi wo mmara so,
Kyerɛ me wo mmaransɛm kwan no
Dan me koma kɔ wʼahyɛde ho
Yi mʼani fi nneɛma hunu so;
Di bɔ a woahyɛ wo somfo no so,
Yi animguase a ɛbɔ me hu no fi hɔ,
Mʼani agyina wo nkyerɛkyerɛ no!
Awurade, ma wo dɔ a ɛnsa da no mmra me so,
Afei mebua nea oyi me ahi no,
Nyi nokwasɛm no mfi mʼanom,
Medi wo mmara so bere biara
Mede ahofadi bɛnantew,
Mɛka wʼahyɛde ho asɛm wɔ ahemfo anim
efisɛ mʼani gye wo mmaransɛm ho,
Mede nidi ma wo mmaransɛm a medɔ no,
Kae asɛm a woaka akyerɛ wo somfo,
Mʼawerɛkyekye wɔ mʼamanehunu mu ne sɛ:
Ahantanfo bu me animtiaa bebree,
Awurade mekae wo tete mmara no,
Abufuw hyɛ me ma, esiane amumɔyɛfo
Wo hyɛ nsɛm yɛ me dwom tiban
Awurade, anadwo mekae wo din,
Eyi ne ade a meyɛ da biara,
Awurade, wo ne me kyɛfa;
Mede me koma nyinaa ahwehwɛ wo;
Madwene mʼakwan ho
Mɛyɛ ntɛm, merentwentwɛn
Ɛwɔ mu, amumɔyɛfo de hama kyekyere me,
Ɔdasu mu, mesɔre de wʼaseda ma wo,
Meyɛ wɔn a wosuro wo nyinaa adamfo,
Awurade, wʼadɔe ahyɛ asase so ma;
Wo ne wo somfo nni no yiye
Kyerɛkyerɛ me nimdeɛ ne atemmu pa,
Mefom ɔkwan ansa na mihuu amane,
Wuye, na nea woyɛ nso ye;
Ahantanfo de atoro asra me ho de,
Wɔn koma yɛ den na wonni ɔtema,
Eye sɛ mihuu amane
Mmara a efi wʼanom no som bo ma me
Wo nsa na ɛbɔɔ me na ɛnwenee me;
Sɛ wɔn a wosuro wo no hu me a, ma wɔn ani nnye,
Awurade, minim sɛnea wo mmara te,
Ma wʼadɔe a ɛnsa da no nkyekye me werɛ
Ma wʼayamhyehye mmra me so, na minnya nkwa,
Ma ahantanfo ani nwu sɛ wɔfom me kwa nti
Ma wɔn a wosuro wo no mmra me nkyɛn,
Ma me koma nnya bembu wɔ wo hyɛ nsɛm ho,
Wo nkwagye ho anigyina ama me kra atɔ piti,
Mahwɛ wo bɔhyɛ anim ama mʼani abu;
Ɛwɔ mu sɛ mete sɛ nsa kotoku a ɛsɛn wusiw ano de,
Wo somfo ntwɛn nkosi da bɛn?
Ahantanfo atu amoa de asum me afiri,
Wo mmara nsɛm nyinaa mu wɔ ahotoso;
Ɛkaa kakraa bi a anka woyii me fii asase so,
Kyɛe me nkwa so sɛnea wʼadɔe te,
Awurade, wʼasɛm no wɔ hɔ daa;
Wo nokwaredi kɔ so wɔ awo ntoatoaso nyinaa mu;
Wo mmara wɔ hɔ besi nnɛ,
Sɛ mʼani anka wo mmara no ho a,
Me werɛ remfi wo nkyerɛkyerɛ no,
Gye me nkwa, na meyɛ wo de;
Amumɔyɛfo retwɛn sɛ wɔbɛsɛe me,
Mahu sɛ pɛyɛ nyinaa wɔ nea ɛkɔpem;
Ao, medɔ wo mmara no yiye!
Wo mmara nsɛm ma mihu nyansa sen mʼatamfo,
Mewɔ nhumu sen mʼakyerɛkyerɛfo nyinaa,
Mewɔ ntease sen mpanyimfo,
Memfaa mʼanan nsii ɔkwan bɔne biara so
Memman mfii wo mmara ho,
Wo nsɛm yɛ me dɛ,
Minya ntease fi wo nkyerɛkyerɛ mu;
Wʼasɛm yɛ mʼanan ase kanea
Maka ntam ahyɛ mu kena se
Mahu amane bebree;
Awurade, ma wʼani nsɔ mʼanom nkamfo a efi me pɛ mu,
Ɛwɔ mu sɛ daa metoto me nkwa ase de,
Amumɔyɛfo asum me afiri,
Wʼahyɛde yɛ mʼagyapade afebɔɔ;
Me koma ayɛ krado sɛ ɛbɛhwɛ wo hyɛ nsɛm so
Mikyi nnipa a wɔn adwene yɛ wɔn ntanta,
Wone me guankɔbea ne me kyɛm;
Mumfi me so nkɔ, mo nnebɔneyɛfo,
Wowaw me sɛnea wo bɔhyɛ no te, na mɛtena nkwa mu;
So me mu, na menya ogye;
Wopo wɔn a wɔfom wo hyɛ nsɛm nyinaa,
Wotow amumɔyɛfo nyinaa gu sɛ afide;
Wo ho suro ma me ho popo;
Mayɛ nea ɛteɛ na ɛyɛ pɛ.
Hwɛ ma wo somfo nni yiye;
Mahwɛ wo nkwagye anim ama mʼani abu,
Wo ne wo somfo nni no sɛnea wʼadɔe te,
Meyɛ wo somfo; ma me nhumu
Awurade, bere aso sɛ woyɛ biribi;
Esiane sɛ medɔ wo mmara nsɛm
na midwen sɛ wo nkyerɛkyerɛ nyinaa ye nti,
Wʼahyɛde yɛ nwonwa;
Wo nsɛm asete ma hann;
Mibue mʼanom na migu ahome,
Dan wʼani hwɛ me na hu me mmɔbɔ
Tutu mʼanammɔn sɛnea wʼasɛm no te;
Gye me fi nnipa nhyɛso mu,
Ma wʼanim nhyerɛn wo somfo so
Nsuten nisu aguare me,
Ɔtreneeni ne wo, Awurade,
Ahyɛde a woayɛ no yɛ trenee;
Abufuw ahyɛ me ma,
Wɔasɔ wo bɔhyɛ ahorow no ahwɛ pa ara,
Ɛwɔ mu sɛ menka hwee na memfra de,
Wo trenee wɔ hɔ daa,
Ɔhaw ne awerɛhow aba me so,
Wʼahyɛde yɛ nokware daa;
Awurade, mede me koma nyinaa mefrɛ wo, gye me so,
Misu mefrɛ wo, gye me nkwa
Mesɔre anɔpahema, na misu pɛ mmoa;
Mʼani gu so anadwo nyinaa,
Tie me nne sɛnea wʼadɔe no te;
Wɔn a wɔhyehyɛ atirimɔdensɛm no abɛn,
Awurade, wo de, wobɛn me,
Mmere bi a atwa mu no, misuaa wʼahyɛde
Hwɛ mʼamanehunu na gye me nkwa
Di mʼasɛm ma me na gye me;
Nkwagye ne atirimɔdenfo ntam kwan ware,
Awurade, wʼayamhyehye yɛ kɛse;
Atamfo a wɔteetee me dɔɔso,
Mehwɛ wɔn a wonni gyidi no a wɔn ho yɛ me nwini,
Hwɛ sɛnea mʼani gye wo nkyerɛkyerɛ ho;
Wo nsɛm nyinaa yɛ nokware;
Sodifo taataa me kwa,
Mʼani gye wo bɔhyɛ ho
Mikyi nkontompo
Mekamfo wo mpɛn ason da biara,
Wɔn a wɔdɔ wo mmara no wɔ asomdwoe mmoroso,
Awurade, metwɛn wo nkwagye,
Midi wʼahyɛde so
Midi wo nkyerɛkyerɛ ne wʼahyɛde so,
Awurade, ma me sufrɛ nnu wʼanim;
Ma me nkotosrɛ nnu wʼanim;
Ma nkamfo nhyɛ mʼanom ma;
Ma me tɛkrɛma nto wʼasɛm ho dwom,
Ma wo nsa nyɛ krado mmɛboa me,
Awurade, mʼani agyina wo nkwagye,
Ma mentena nkwa mu na matumi akamfo wo,
Mafom kwan sɛ oguan a wayera.
